actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-408.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate in lieu of passage of H.R. 5952.

official_title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Planning Act to extend the authority for financial assistance to the States for water resources planning.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-408) Makes changes in the membership of the Water Resources Council, under the Water Resources Planning Act, by removing the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare and including the Secretaries of Commerce, Housing and Urban Development, and Transportation, and the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency. Extends the authorization for State planning grants through fiscal year 1978 at a level of $5,000,000 per year, under such Act. Extends the authorization for national assessments and coordination of River Basin plans in the total amount of $10,000,000 for fiscal years 1976 and 1977.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Planning Act to extend the authority for financial assistance to the States for water resources planning.
